title: Bonus Episode: Bernie Sanders
description:
Vermont Senator Bernie Sanders calls in to discuss Thursday night's debate and his campaign. Matt and Katie discuss the results of Matt's debate night drinking game. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
